*edX is hiring a Social Media Co-op* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

edX, an online learning platform founded by Harvard and MIT and home to over 38 million learners, seeks our first-ever Social Media Co-Op to help bring our new social media strategy to life. This role is designed for currently enrolled students (either as an undergrad marketing major OR a graduate student), paid, and runs from July 2021 through December 2021. You will focus on assisting the Social Media Associate in implementing strategies to drive organic growth and engagement across edX’s social media channels. You’ll report to our Social Media Associate, and be part of our collaborative Brand Marketing team. The ideal candidate has strong written and verbal communication skills, fluency in social media platforms, and a high motivation to learn. Some social media management and analytics experience is preferred. This is a 35-40 hours a week position but we'd consider fewer hours for the right candidate. Thank you!

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3ifM4BW>

<@UJFCA8FAR>
